title: What is Anthroposophy to me? - Holistic Health Consultancy
author: Anna
cleaned_text: What is Anthroposophy to me? Here I talk about 1. How I meat Anthroposophy 2. How it gives me an orientation in life 3. Transforming Scars into Stars 4. Anthroposophy as a self development tool 5. What positive thinking really is in my opinion 6. Ways of helping those on the other side 7. Anthroposophy as a source of healing for individual and for community 8. How I currently practice Anthroposophy. Most important References: How to know the Higher Worlds Rudolf Steiner Staying Connected Rudolf Steiner It did not
